text: Uye nezuva iro avo vasingatendi (muhumwechete waAllah) vachaendeswa kumoto (zvichataurwa zvichinzi): “Zvakanaka zvenyu makazviwana paupenyu hwenyu hwepanyika, uye mukanakidzwa mairi. Zvino zuva ranhasi muchapiwa murango unonyadzisa, nokuda kwekuti maizvitutumadza panyika zvisina mvumo, uye imi maipandukira mirairo yaAllah (maisateerera Allah).”
